white: Wearing a Rrrrrr like a scarf.
Breq escaping with two bodies instead of one.
Breq forgetting she doesn't have another body.
Ten thousand versions of Anaander Mianaai.
Those strange vacuum adapted humans that still sorta haunt me.
Seivarden coming home to Ekalu's room drunk on accident and having to play it off like she didn't mean to go to Breq's room instead.
A nearly complete set of casting coins.
Breq's magical girl transformation into a gun.
Spending a thousand years in stasis.
The Fleet Captain's most generous indulgence.
Breq drunk, singing the alphabet and forgetting the words halfway through.
Replacing Breq's tea with coffee as a prank, but she doesn't even notice.
Coming to Fleet Captain's dinner for the leftovers.
Anaander, playing ping pong with herself for what is going on 37 hours now.
Licking things to claim them as your own.
The second of euphoria before Breq's fist connects with your face.
Breq canonly walking into a wall.
Having an iron fist in a velvet glove.
Seivarden throwing a tantrum on the floor in the hallway and everyone just stepping over her, going on with their day.
Realizing that actually, you like killing people and don't think it's that big of a deal.
A pool of blood in the Amaat Decade room.
She Commands Me and I Obey.
Having to ask your sister to cut your arm off 'cause you're a wimp.
An impromptu rave in the Undergarden, with zero causalities.
A gentle caress of the inner thigh.
Pretending to be an ancillary to get out of social engagements.
Being ship's favorite and knowing it.
Getting stranded on an icy planet with only white people.
Naming a government on the spot.
Cleaning the ship again because Fleet Captain ordered you to.
The negligible difference between Amaat and a duck.
Lying naked face-down in the snow.
A Radchaai infant with sticky hands.
Being so oblivious you don't realize someone is propositioning you.
The other other other other other OTHER Anaander.
Incorrect use of the Presger gun.
A hairline fracture in Kalr Five's favorite tea cup that nobody will admit responsibility for.
Getting patronized by a Radchaai in your own system.
A clientage pin made of plastic with the glass gem ripped off.
For sale: One Ancillary. Never used.
Anaander Mianaai splitting over an ice cream choice.
The inevitable heat death of the universe.
Telling Breq to take a chill pill.
One foot, and then the other.
Realizing you are just a cog in the murder machine.
Someone actually doing what they're supposed to for once.
A moment of silence for Bo Three, who probably still thinks about messing up the jump.
An entire ship of drunks, steering itself.
Beheading your opponent in political sportsball.
Tisarwat with her hands duct taped, playing Edward 40 hands.
Shaving your head and painting your face white because you broke a nail.
Accidentally becoming Governor of Noage because sports.
Anaander being genuinely nice for once.
Being the lieutenant of the lowest decade, but everyone wants to kneel to you anyway.
Things you can only do in the Undergarden.
Having your autonomy taken away from you.
Wearing a lover's ring under your glove.
Ending you in the medical bay, again.
Sweeping award season with your debut novel.
Sphene in a big comfy sweater that is so poofy it can barely walk.
The chillest AI uprising in history.
Communally drinking arrack from Breq's prosthetic leg.
So much blood that it COULDN'T be Seivarden's because she'd be dead if it was.
Selling your first born for a pound of tea.
Strange sounds coming from a shipping container.
Being stuck in a small ship for six months with your ex's hot nephew.
Joining a religious cult for money.
A decorative box of Notai make.
The sound Kalr Five makes when someone breaks a teacup.
Sphene with a ring of fish sauce around its lips.
The lingering doubt that Anaander Mianaai is even human.
Using a Presger translator as a purse.
Breq replacing her leg with a gun.
She Commands Me And I Am Gay.
Aggressive queuing as a form of protest.
The Presger gun making a duck quack noise when it fires.
DeathBall™ as a viable political system.
Hunting Anaander Mianaai for fun and profit.
Selling a vital piece of equipment for drugs.
Making your lieutenant do it for you.
Sleeping with Seivarden because it's your turn tonight.
Kicking out your teammate's kneecap, for Justice.
Putting the double A's in the wrong place.
A lot of blood and a lot of tea.
Swallowing a memorial pin so the person will be closer to your heart.
Seivarden and Tisarwat taking turns laughing as the other one cries.
The Republic of a Thousand Eggs.
The first draft of your novel being as bad as Basnaaid's teenage poetry.
A duel to the death over the pronunciation of "ancillary".
Anaander Mianaai in a fashionable mini skirt.
A bunch of whiny cis white men complaining about the future of sci-fi.
Justice of Toren One Esk Eighteen, Breq's lesser known sister.
A Rrrrrr ambassador and it's human translator.
A mask that is decorated like a disco ball.
A home video of Seivarden sobbing into a Lean Cuisine®.
Dlique in a Hawaiian print shirt with a fanny pack.
Catching Sphene in your ancillary storage with its hands against a pod, lovingly.
Cheering up the baby lieutenant after her first time.
Accidentally going into the storage container for a quickie but finding someone else waiting and going with it anyway.
Replacing every word in a report with "fuck you".
Anaander Mianaai literally going to fuck herself.
Inviting someone to tea just so you can subtly shit talk about them in front of your friends.
Rethinking your entire life after falling off a bridge.
